meta.name: Hong Kong’s First Vegan Store
meta.about:
We offers Vegan and organic beauty products and supplements in Asia! ✈️ Ship worldwide
🚫 No animal ingredient

meta.name: Vegan Concept
meta.about: 首間純素生活店，主要在亞洲地區售賣「純素」及「零殘忍」美容及營養補充品。我們相信美麗和健康，不需犧牲動物！

address.en: Unit 905, 9/F, World Interests Building, 8 Tsun Yip Lane, Kwun Tong, Kowloon, Hong Kong
